This demonstration project fund Gilead 's Investigator Sponsored Research . The purpose assess feasibility treat inmate FDA approve combination oral treatment , sofosbuvir/velpatasvir , Eplcusa® . The San Francisco Department Public Health 's Jail Health Services treat 100 patient . Intensive patient navigator essential component treatment ensure medication adherence achieve SVR discharge jail prior HCV treatment completion . Navigators provide short-term case management service link patient medical social support service . This demonstration project facilitate Jail Health Services ' HIV & Integrated Services ( formerly Forensic AIDS Project ) .
